children.name: toString

parameters.name: separator `String` *(default: ",")*
parameters.description: The separator to place between elements.

children.description: Formats the matrix elements as a string.

children.name: toArray
children.description: Returns the matrix elements as an [a, b, c, d, e, f] array.

children.name: multiplyCopy
children.description: Multiplies the matrix with another one and returns the result as new instance.The current instance elements are not altered.

children.name: round
children.description: Rounds the matrix elements to the specified number of fractional digits.

children.name: equals

parameters.name: other `kendo.geometry.Matrix`
parameters.description: The matrix instance to compare with.

children.description: Compares this matrix with another instance.

children.name: clone
children.description: Creates a new instance with the same element values.
